page.title: 10Longage Farm; a sheep farm
page.content: Mr Ridley-Day has a big flock of sheep. He has 400 ewes and 10 rams. He also has this years lambs and last years lambs which are called tegs. Half his ewes are Kent or Romney Marsh. Kent sheep have good quality fleeces. The other half of his flock are mules. Mules are a cross between Border Leicester and Swaledale. Border Leicester shep are prolific and have lots of lambs. Swaledale sheep are hardy. The rams are Hampshire Down because that breed fatten quickly. The sheep mostly eat grass, hay and concentrates.
